subTitle: Analyze
instruction: Match the relevant area to its characteristic feature.

options.question: The purpose of Analyze phase is to understand which inputs are causing the problem in the output
The purpose of the Analyze is to create lot of charts and ghraphs
Once in the Analyze Phase you must remain there until the root cause has been figured out
The purpose of Analyze phase is to understand which inputs are causing the problem in the output
The Analyze phase cannot succced without creating charts
